attributes.action: revoke the requirement for bio-fuel additive targets forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the increasing shortage of food world wide, it must make sense to postpone the requirements for the increased use of biofuels, when those requirements are contributing to food shortages and the associated rise in food prices. After all it makes little sense to "protect the planet" if the inhabitants of that planet have starved to death.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
